Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: Here's what you need to know from today's news media coverage. Firstly; the Reserve Bank is considering a rate rise but only once inflation and wage growth rise. According to news sources; the National Disability Insurance Scheme requires reforms to meet participants' needs adequately. Some report that investors should beware of the rally in housing and retail stocks as the Central Bank may raise the rates twice this year. There are also reports suggesting that the May budget should prioritize making Australia's energy supply stronger instead of tax increases.
